response.overview: Victor Frankenstein is a promising young doctor who, devastated by the death of his mother during childbirth, becomes obsessed with bringing the dead back to life. His experiments lead to the creation of a monster, which Frankenstein has put together with the remains of corpses. It's not long before Frankenstein regrets his actions.
response.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein

results.name: Kenneth Branagh "Mary Shelly's Frankenstein" 1994- Bobbie Wygant Archive
